column5: I can't remember whether I've posted these shots before, but anyhow I just found them burried in a file on my computer here at work. They were a taken a couple of springs back with a regular 35mm camera, nothing special. These kinds of shots are incredibly hard to get. Getting 2 is very rare....
Cool pics. They are even harder to get now with the new digital cameras been a bit slower to process the pics. Thanks

Wow...you have some awesome pics!! You should publish them in a book!!  I've tried more than a few times to get action shots like that, but the damn shutter isn't quick enough with my cheapo digital camera...LOL
